name: ListOrderedMap2Test
description: Unit tests for ListOrderedMap2 class, focusing on index-based operations and value retrieval.

nested_classes.name: TestListView
nested_classes.description: Internal test view class extending AbstractListTest

test_cases.name: testGetByIndex
test_cases.description: Tests the get method by index, ensuring it handles out-of-bounds indices correctly and retrieves elements correctly.

test_cases.name: testGetValueByIndex
test_cases.description: Tests the getValue method by index, ensuring it handles out-of-bounds indices correctly and retrieves values correctly.

test_cases.name: testIndexOf
test_cases.description: Tests the indexOf method, ensuring it returns the correct index for elements and handles non-existent elements correctly.

test_cases.name: testRemoveByIndex
test_cases.description: Tests the remove method by index, ensuring it handles out-of-bounds indices correctly and removes elements correctly.
